column4: Adobe Flash is no longer working in FireFox  I reinstalled the flash package, but that didn't help.  Any ideas?
I'm not sure if it's site specific.  I'm having trouble loading this video http://www.thedailyshow.com/full-episodes/mon-february-27-2012-neil-degrasse-tyson
yep, not working here either. perhaps a new version of flash was just released
TY for the confirmation.  It's at least not just my machine.
